lom:description.lom:string: This web based software contains information and Web links related to the field of colloid and interface science, and to the research group headed by Prof. Laurier L. Schramm, at the University of Calgary. This software is divided into the following sections: - What is Colloid and Interface Science? - Glossary of Terms in Colloid & Interface Science - Some Acronyms in Colloid & Interface Science - Some Useful Correlations - Famous Colloid & Interface Scientists - Colloid & Interface Science Books - Colloid & Interface Science Articles - Colloid & Interface Science Lectures - Research Group Staff (Areas of expertise) - Current Research Projects - What's New! - For Students in My Graduate Course in Colloid and Interface Chemistry - Frequently Asked Questions in Colloid and Interface Science - Convenient Web links - Search my pages! - Disclaimer
